sentences.en: A courtesy shuttle bus operates between the hotel and the town.
sentences.cn: 有免费班车往返于酒店和市区。

sentences.en: A shuttle bus operates to and from the beach of San Benedetto.
sentences.cn: 有穿梭巴士往返于圣贝内代托海滩。

sentences.en: A shuttle bus runs frequently between the Inn and the Country Club.
sentences.cn: 一辆区间公交车频繁地往返于这家旅馆和那个乡村俱乐部。

sentences.en: a shuttle service between London and Edinburgh
sentences.cn: 往返于伦敦和爱丁堡之间的航班

sentences.en: He took the Washington - New York shuttle.
sentences.cn: 他乘坐华盛顿－纽约的往返班机。

sentences.en: Light and shade come in swift alternation ; Days and months flash by as quickly as a weaver's shuttle.
sentences.cn: 光阴似箭,日月如梭.

sentences.en: Light travels like an arrow, and time like a shuttle.
sentences.cn: 光阴似箭，日月如梭。

sentences.en: More than 200 improvements, many of them major, were made in the design and fabrication of the shuttle.
sentences.cn: 在航天飞机的设计及制造过程中，作了两百多项改进，其中很多是大的改动。

sentences.en: Of course, you could do experiments in the shuttle very well, where you have, again, only air around you.
sentences.cn: 当然，也可以在航天飞机上做实验,除了空气周围什么都没有，效果一样。

sentences.en: She struck the web with her shuttle and rent it in pieces.
sentences.cn: 她用梭子猛击织物,并把它弄得粉碎.

sentences.en: Simultaneously, a mysterious piece of debris flew high into the air near the shuttle, apparently from the flame trench.
sentences.cn: 同时，一个未知的碎片在太空梭附近飞向天空，显然这个碎片是来自下方的火焰的。

sentences.en: The passengers were shuttled to the hotel by bus.
sentences.cn: 旅客由班车送到酒店。

sentences.en: The satellite acts as a drag on the shuttle.
sentences.cn: 卫星成了航天飞机的累赘。

sentences.en: The shuttle Endeavour will be taking the astronauts to the Hubble.
sentences.cn: “奋进”号航天飞机将把宇航员送上哈勃.

sentences.en: The shuttle moves backwards and forwards through the warp.
sentences.cn: 梭子在经线中来回移动.

sentences.en: The shuttle often got stuck, causing a lot of broken ends.
sentences.cn: 梭子常常卡住, 造成大量断头.

sentences.en: The shuttle will spend five days docked with Mir.
sentences.cn: 航天飞机将和和平号对接5天。

sentences.en: The space shuttle had been scheduled to blast off at 04:38.
sentences.cn: 航天飞机已经预定于凌晨4点38分发射升空。

sentences.en: The space shuttle undertook a topsecret mission with a military payload under Pentagon control.
sentences.cn: 航天飞机执行一项绝密使命,使军用酬载由五角大楼控制.

sentences.en: The supermarket operates a complimentary shuttle service.
sentences.cn: 这家超市提供免费购物班车.

sentences.en: There is a free 24-hour shuttle between the airport terminals.
sentences.cn: 在机场的各航空站之间有24小时的免费穿梭巴士。

sentences.en: There’s a shuttle service from the city center to the airport.
sentences.cn: 从市中心到机场有穿梭班车服务。

sentences.en: They stand guard with weapons as the human survivors of the battle are marched onto the shuttle.
sentences.cn: 他们站在一起用武器护卫着战后的人类幸存者鱼贯进入航天飞机。

sentences.en: This morning's launch of the space shuttle Columbia has been delayed.
sentences.cn: 原定今早“哥伦比亚”号航天飞机的发射已被推迟.

sentences.en: When the humans are all back on Prometheus the last shuttle will be destroyed so no-one can come back.
sentences.cn: 当人类都返回普罗米修斯号后，最后一架航天飞机后将被摧毁，所以没有人能回来。

words.tran_cn: [航]航天飞机；穿梭；[纺]梭子；穿梭班机、公共汽车等

phrases.tran_cn: 班车（在较短距离之间往返的交通车）；豪华轿车
穿梭式矿车；梭车；往返架车
n. 短程运输；往返大巴服务；区间飞航
航天飞机（往返于地球和太空站之间运载人和物资的）

trans.tran_cn: 往来于两地之间的航班等，梭
使频繁往来于，往返运送
trans.tran_en: to travel frequently between two places
to travel frequently between two places
to travel frequently between two places
